title: Prizes for the Ozarks Regional Air Guitar Championship
body:
We're nearly one week away from the preliminaries for the very first Ozarks Regional AIR GUITAR Championship, and I am PUMPED! We've received a ton of positive comments about the event, and I have a feeling we're going to have a decent turnout at the Outland next Wednesday night. My biggest worry, however, is that plenty of people will show up to WATCH, but not many will want to show off their sweet AIR GUITAR skillz. So, I'm asking for some assistance from you guys - tell everyone you know who might be the least bit interested in rocking out on stage to show up Wednesday night. We only need FIVE people to move on to the finals, so we're looking for AT LEAST 10 to 15 participants.

I'm going to let you in on a little secret too... well, it's not really a secret secret, since I'm hoping you'll use this info to lure people to the preliminaries, but you get the idea. The winner of this year's event is going to win a LOT of cool stuff. We haven't announced the prizes on OzarksAirGuitar.com yet, but I'm going to give you guys an exclusive scoop on what the first annual Ozarks Regional Air Guitar Champion will take home with him or her:

  1. The champion will win a REAL guitar from Springfield Music, along with a year's worth of free guitar lessons.

  2. The winner will get to perform as an opening act during Q102's ROCKFEST.

  3. This hasn't been 100% confirmed yet, but we're pretty sure we'll be able to send the winner to Dallas (expenses paid), so they can compete for a chance to qualify for the WORLD AIR GUITAR CHAMPIONSHIP!

  4. There's also a very, very strong chance that the winner will take home some cold hard cash... the amount will be determined before they perform on June 2nd.

  5. They'll also win... are you ready for this?... a free Moxie t-shirt!!!! OMG!,

So there you have it. Run, go tell your friends, spread the word, and make sure you show up next Wednesday night for what will surely be one of the coolest, most unique events to hit Springfield in a long, long time. ROCK ON SPRINGFIELD!
author: Dan

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body: Geez, that's a crazy amount of big-time stuff. You're killing us kids, Dan, killing the children.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: And the US Air Guitar Association will hold a spot for the winner at their Dallas regionals.

comments.author: brad
comments.body: i would go for it, if i was going to be around for any of the other events..but i'll be out of the country. and i wouldn't want to disappoint my fans by cockteasing them w/ a mean solo next week and then nothing else afterwards..

comments.author: nicole
comments.body:
Watch Fox tonight at 9:30 for Dan talking about the event! Rumor has it, there's also going to be some press at the event. I'm so excited!

Does anyone want to be a "sacrificial" guitar player, where they perform to get the judges and audience warmed up?

comments.author: Megster
comments.body:
i think johnny greenwood vs. the ebola virus would be a super awesome sacrificial guitar player... or actually, maybe he should just enter... i have seen him do many a johnny impression on air guitar...

i think my friends chris and tyler are both entering this. i'm excited.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Yowza! I've expressed my paranoia multiple times that we'll have a bunch of people watching, but nobody participating. This has the potential to be huge, people. You must participate! If it's a success, we can make it an annual tradition! Woohoo to annual traditions with The Landers (Rocky Horror!).

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body: Well Meg, Jonny can't enter. He's just a wee 17 year old like me.

comments.author: Megster
comments.body:
oh yea... that sucks.

well... i am going to force chirstopher to enter... he takes air guitar very seriously... and looks the part... super tall, lanky, shaggy haired, pierced tattooed guy... i even have a dragonforce solo in mind i know for a fact he has air guitared before.

comments.author: Megster
comments.body: so... um, how does one enter this... do you just show up with your song?  because if i am going to be forcing people to enter, i need to know the procedure...

comments.author: nate
comments.body: I have a day to pick a guitar solo and rehearse.  I don't know if it's gonna happen.  I may just go with something that will require no rehearsing... something that is in my very blood, something that with every note resonates in the very fibers of my being.  Something like "Stairway to Heaven," or possibly "My Sharona" by the Knack.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Just show up at 9pm at The Outland. $3 cover charge. It's going to be like Open Mic Night - so have a pre-made CD with your 60-second clip (it will be easier for the sound guy to play than to have to queue it up).

comments.author: brad
comments.body: my sister is going to compete..i put a song together for her tonight. that's right...i'm the don king to her mike tyson. look out the rest of you foos! by the time she's done shredding, your asses will be melted to your seats!

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Only a few hours away! Raise your hand if you're competing...I'm so curious!

comments.author: Megster
comments.body: hey...so kel and i are making a cd for our friends that are entering so their solos will be cued up and ready to go... is it ok if they are like 20 seconds too long?  so they have a little warning...?

comments.author: nicole
comments.body:
Yeah, that shouldn't be a problem.

Woohoo!

comments.author: Megster
comments.body: awesome!

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Actually - I take that back - it probably should be 60 seconds. If other people are only having the same amount of time...I think I misunderstood. Sorry!

comments.author: brad
comments.body: i just have to say....that was fuckin 'a awesome. too bad half the crowd snorted too junk much beforehand...it got a little...wild, to say the least. but, it was ch'awesome..

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Thanks to everyone who came out - we had a really great time and have a superb lineup for June! This will definitely be an annual event, so for those who missed out this year - we'll do it again!

comments.author: fawx
comments.body: if someone didn't get a picture of dan on stage carrying swamp thing around on his back, i'm going to throw a fit.

comments.author: Megster
comments.body:
oh man... i think kelly did... maybe... we will see...

i am so proud of swamp thing.

(because he didn't throw up or pass out or start a fight with anyone)

his little brother is going to be four finger's roommate next year...

comments.author: fawx
comments.body:
alot of us seemed pretty ramped up on testosterone and ready to do the man dance.

i'm not sure how it started, with people wanting to get in fights, but i couldn't wait to roll up my sleeves, stick my glasses in my pocket, crack my knuckles, and hide in the bathroom.

comments.author: dan
comments.body: I was only going to fight b/c that dude called Ingrid a bitch.

comments.author: fawx
comments.body:
i must have walked away right before that, since ashli chased me down and said something was happening.

good thing i didn't hear it, that would've been an embarassing fight for me.

comments.author: Megster
comments.body: what?  what happened?  who called ingrid a bitch? was this after i left?

comments.author: Megster
comments.body: oh wait... i completely forgot... people did pull ups last night... and i kicked gril #2's ass wrestling... wow... i forgot that whole episode... but there was real fighting? or potential real fighting? yikes.

comments.author: fawx
comments.body: it was before the spontaneous pull up contest, i believe.

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body:
WHOA. DAMMMMMMIT. Why did I have to miss this?! UGH.

First off, Buterbaugh is named "Swamp Thing"? That's cool.
Second, Buterbaugh jumped on Dan's back?? That's... I can't decide.
Third, if I follow the comments on this page correctly, Buterbaugh was on the who called Ingrid a bitch? NOT COOL.

comments.author: nate
comments.body: No.  It was random dude wandering out shirtless out back behind the Mudlounge.  It was right after I pwnd Ingrid wrestling.  Dan and I were gonna go all Double Dragon on his ass, but then his mom came and picked him up.  So then we did pull ups.

comments.author: Megster
comments.body:
no...christopher is rowdy but he would not call ingrid a bitch...

nate wrestled ingrid too? did i wrestle ingrid? i think i only wrestled lanie...

but yes buterbaugh (chris) was named swamp thing and he had a viking helmet on...lots of stick on tattoos (in addition to his real tattoos) and flannel shirt unbuttoned with the sleeves cut off and a denim vest that said "eat shit and die" on the back of it...

chris is awesome.

and i was confused by the jumping on dan's back thing... it seemed like this was something dan encouraged... i couldn't tell...

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body:
I wanted to go.

(Erin tear)

comments.author: fawx
comments.body:
shirtless dude wasn't shirtless until i saw him rip it off and throw it god knows where. what was his deal?

i also remember having to fight my way through yells and screams of "sit down! don't go out there!" just to peak around the corner.

comments.author: nate
comments.body:
Posted By: Megsternate wrestled ingrid too? did i wrestle ingrid? i think i only wrestled lanie...

We wrestled outside, for about two seconds, which was about how long it took to put her ass on the ground, which got gravel on both of us. It was, in fact, the first official wrestling match of the evening, though few were there to see it. Lucky for Ingrid, I say.
Yeah! 100 pages of being proud of overpowering girls that are 60 pounds lighter than me! Yeah!

comments.author: ingrid
comments.body:
um, nate? i think you are a little confused as to how things actually happened last night.

a) it took you an embarrassing minute and a half to get me down, and b) i don't think you are 60 lbs heavier than me and c) dan was going to fight the shirtless guy, you were just laughing and shiftily looking for the nearest exit.

comments.author: nate
comments.body:
I have never seen such a large collection of falsehoods in one post. Slander! or Libel! I don't know which! But it is one of those two!

Seriously, Ingrid. Two seconds, if that. We can film it next time. You can't be more than, like, 110 pounds. And I just let Dan do the talking. When I strike, I strike with cold, deadly silence.

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body:
REMATCH!



Remember when Dan told us to act civilized on these blog threads, because some people only read the blogs and we shouldn't be seen acting like such hooligans soiling the Moxie's good name? Pff.

comments.author: ingrid
comments.body: it is hard for me to not be a hooligan.

comments.author: Ashli444
comments.body:
Nate- Ingrid totally took you down- I witnessed the whole thing!

The best part of last night was the impromptu pull-up contest! By the way, can anyone remember who won? Someone got 21 didn't they??

comments.author: Megster
comments.body: 21?  damn that is a lot of pull ups.

comments.author: Ashli444
comments.body:
Posted By: fawxalot of us seemed pretty ramped up on testosterone and ready to do the man dance.

i'm not sure how it started, with people wanting to get in fights, but i couldn't wait to roll up my sleeves, stick my glasses in my pocket, crack my knuckles, and hide in the bathroom.


such a mama's boy... ;)

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: The guy who ripped his shirt off in the parking lot was also the guy who threatened to beat up the judges for not putting Swampthing in the Top 5.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: And that was me who did 21 pull ups...if 21 is the same thing as 4, with Dan lifting me up to reach the bar each time.

comments.author: nate
comments.body:
Me. That was me who lifted you up. You flew higher than an eagle, for I was the wind beneath your wings.

Flyyy, flyyyy, flyyyyyyyy... high against the sky,
so high you almost touch the sky.
Thank me, thank me,
thank God for me, the wind beneath your wings.

comments.author: Megster
comments.body:
Posted By: nicoleThe guy who ripped his shirt off in the parking lot was also the guy who threatened to beat up the judges for not putting Swampthing in the Top 5.


yep. that is the d-bag i thought it was. i will do something evil to him. like kick him in the face... or, he's a skate boarder...perhaps a screw or two will go missing from his wheels... these things happen...

CANNOT STAND THAT GUY.

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body:
Should I come over and take care of business, Meg?

I'm the family muscle.





No, I'm not.

comments.author: nate
comments.body:
Posted By: nateMe. That wasmewho lifted you up. You flew higher than an eagle, for I was the wind beneath your wings.

Flyyy, flyyyy, flyyyyyyyy... high against the sky,
so high you almost touch the sky.
Thank me, thank me,
thank God for me, the wind beneath your wings.


this maybe should have gone in the music lyrics thread. Sorry.

comments.author: dan
comments.body: I was the one who lifted Nicole. Nate: you lifted Ingrid. I was also the one who you remember getting 21 chin-ups. It would've been more, but the rafter started to sag and splinter, so I gave it a break.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body:
We have video footage!

Here are the two YouTube links:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=If9VzgoYbpU
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gVmRTOLwakw

Thanks to Blondie who took pics and video all night.

comments.author: Megster
comments.body:
the d-bag guy was being his normal d-bag self last night and decided that punching chris in the face would be a good idea... according to an eye witness chris "beat the holy fuck" out of him... so there you go ingrid, dan, nate, all others he was an ass to... he has been punished.

he is also moving out of state very soon... so that makes me happy.

comments.author: brad
comments.body: video! nice.
